Making sure that all functions participate, and data is interpreted in a strategic way, extracting the key business implications.Marketing Insights & Analytics Manager (IMEA) will be Responsible to --Responsible for driving Insights and Analytics Excellence Area across India, Middle East and Africa Sales Cluster
Actively own relationships with key stakeholders across the business, gathering short and long-term requirements and providing on going market analytic support.
Develop proficiency in understanding various internal information databases and be able to think holistically to link with business goals and KPIs.
Drive annual business planning process for the Clusters and sales companies within
Ability to think holistically to provide insights based on trends.
Strengthen the internal focus by carrying out bespoke research/analysis on data to achieve actionable insights for the leadership team supporting in critical business decision making.
Assist teams and individuals across the business in framing questions, defining goals and constructing aligned, accurate and actionable metrics to track performance.
Deliver insights effectively through visualisations, reports and decks.
Within the marketing team, contribute to continuous improvement of analytic best practices and framework.What you can be –6+ years of proven experience providing market insights and analytic support, ideally within the B2B industry.
Engineer with MBA would be added advantage.
High level of numeracy with Quantitative/ statistical analytic skills
Proficiency with business intelligence tools like Microsoft Access, Power BI, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft PowerPoint
Experience with visualizing data in reports, dashboards, and decks
Strong attention to detail, natural curiosity with ability to problem-solve creatively.
Exceptionally strong communication skills (both written and verbal), strong collaboration skills, and the ability to work effectively with a diversity of business users, of different technical abilities.
Self-starter who can effectively manage time and workload.
An independent learner who can identify knowledge gaps and opportunities for improvements and reach out for resource.The Location-PuneWhy should you apply:We offer you an interesting and challenging position in an open and friendly environment where we help each other to develop and create value for our customers.
Exciting place to build a global network with different nationalities to mingle and to learn.
Your work will have a true impact on Alfa Laval’s future success, you will be learning new things every day.We always look for both experience and potential, so if you think you have what it takes to join us and are curious to find out more, apply…Job Details
